title: Genetics of PLCG2 expression and splicing relative to Alzheimer's disease risk.
abstract: PLCG2 is associated with the risk of Alzheimer's disease (AD) through a rare missense polymorphism, rs72824905 (P522R) as well as a common variant, rs12446759, within a long non-coding RNA adjacent to  To evaluate  We report PLCG2 isoforms that include (i) a transcript that replaces  We report that two AD genetic risk factors, rs12446759 and rs1071644, affect AD risk by impacting the
